members.signatureBeforeChange: public Rectangle computeTrim (int x, int y, int width, int height)
members.signatureAfterChange: public Rectangle computeTrim (int x, int y, int width, int height)
diff: -	int trimY = y - marginHeight - tabHeight - borderTop;
+		int trimY = onBottom ? y - borderTop : y - HIGHLIGHT_HEADER - tabHeight - borderTop;

+		return new Rectangle (trimX, trimY, trimWidth, trimHeight);

-	return new Rectangle (trimX, trimY, trimWidth, trimHeight);

members.signatureBeforeChange: public Rectangle computeTrim (int x, int y, int width, int height)
members.signatureAfterChange: public Rectangle computeTrim (int x, int y, int width, int height)
diff: -	int trimX = x - marginWidth - highlight_margin - borderLeft;

members.signatureBeforeChange: public Rectangle computeTrim (int x, int y, int width, int height)
members.signatureAfterChange: public Rectangle computeTrim (int x, int y, int width, int height)
diff: -	int trimY = y - marginHeight - tabHeight - borderTop;
+		if (!showBorders) return new Rectangle(x, y, width, height);
+		return new Rectangle (trimX, trimY, trimWidth, trimHeight);
+		int trimY = y - marginHeight - tabHeight - borderTop - 1;
+		// -1 is for the line at the bottom of the tabs
+		int trimHeight = height + borderTop + borderBottom + 2*marginHeight + tabHeight + 1;
+		return new Rectangle (trimX, trimY, trimWidth, trimHeight);
-	int trimHeight = height + borderTop + borderBottom + 2*marginHeight + tabHeight;
-	return new Rectangle (trimX, trimY, trimWidth, trimHeight);
